spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained. However, several windows on the exterior-facing walls (Bed 2 and Bed 1) are hallucinated or incorrectly sized compared to the floor plan's specific window markers. Door swing directions for TOI-1 and Bedroom 1 are slightly skewed.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing the specific exterior utility deck wall enclosure on the bottom-left. The small deck attached to Bed 1 shows text '58 x 46' instead of '5'8" x 4'5"'. Hallucinated exterior windows on the lower-left and bottom-right edges of the model not present in the 2D architectural lines.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent furniture mapping, including the dining set, couch arrangement, and rugs. Wardrobe placements match the floor plan sketches exactly.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric projection and clean geometry. Text labels are preserved as textures which increases clarity but introduces some OCR-style artifacts in the rendering of dimensions.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated exterior windows on the south and west primary walls not indicated in the 2D plan.
Text distortion on the secondary deck dimensions ('66x46' instead of '5'8x4'5').
The utility area at the bottom left is rendered as an open platform/deck rather than an enclosed utility room with high windows as suggested by the plan.
Door orientation into Bed-1 and C.TOI slightly deviates from the swing paths indicated in the 1/4 arc lines of the floor plan.
